explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a game screen featuring various buildings. In the lower-left corner, there is a player character with his back to the camera. He has white hair, wears black clothes, and carries a black backpack with red patterns. There's a wall in front of the white-haired player. At the top of the screen are blue and red score boxes with the numbers 5 and 2, respectively. Between the score boxes is white text "Objective: 40," with the time displayed below. The lower-right corner of the screen shows the player's weapon switching interface.

[0-5] Immediately afterward, the camera zooms in, focusing on a blue gun. The enemy player and the white-haired player are hiding behind cover, shooting at each other. During the shootout, the enemy player runs out of cover, and the white-haired player seizes the opportunity to hit him.
